body_html: @pkubik Yep, 1.1.0 as per pip install -U tensorflow-gpu. (Further, calling the input function in a validation monitor (despite deprecated) stops my training when the "validation" input queue reaches its end. That might be a different issue, but it definitely is not smooth.)
body_text: @pkubik Yep, 1.1.0 as per pip install -U tensorflow-gpu. (Further, calling the input function in a validation monitor (despite deprecated) stops my training when the "validation" input queue reaches its end. That might be a different issue, but it definitely is not smooth.)
body: @pkubik Yep, 1.1.0 as per `pip install -U tensorflow-gpu`. (Further, calling the input function in a validation monitor (despite deprecated) stops my training when the "validation" input queue reaches its end. That might be a different issue, but it definitely is not smooth.)
